title: Agreement and Denial
goal: Learn words for asserting, agreeing, and denying.

sections.content:
New Material (5-7 min)

New Vocabulary

Lojban Place Structure English
xusra x1 asserts/claims x2 (proposition) assert/claim
tugni x1 agrees with x2 about x3 agree
natfe x1 denies/refutes x2 (proposition) deny
drani x1 is correct/right about x2 correct

Asserting and Claiming

mi xusra lo du'u ti xamgu

I assert that this is good.

la .bob. cu xusra lo du'u ri klama

Bob claims that he goes.

Agreeing

mi tugni do

I agree with you.

mi tugni do lo du'u ti jetnu

I agree with you that this is true.

Denying

mi natfe lo du'u ti xamgu

I deny that this is good.

la .alis. cu natfe ti

Alice denies this.

Being Correct

do drani

You are correct.

ti drani

This is correct/right.

Key Point

xusra (assert), tugni (agree), natfe (deny), drani (correct) — essential for discussion and debate.

sections.content:
Practice (4-5 min)

Exercise 1: Assertion

Translate:

  1. I claim that this is true.
  2. Bob asserts that he is right.
  3. She claims this.
Answers
  1. mi xusra lo du'u ti jetnu
  2. la .bob. cu xusra lo du'u ri drani
  3. ri xusra ti

Exercise 2: Agreement

Translate:

  1. I agree with you.
  2. Bob agrees with Alice.
  3. I agree that this is good.
Answers
  1. mi tugni do
  2. la .bob. cu tugni la .alis.
  3. mi tugni lo du'u ti xamgu

Exercise 3: Denial

Translate:

  1. I deny that.
  2. She denies this is true.
  3. You are correct.
Answers
  1. mi natfe ta
  2. ri natfe lo du'u ti jetnu
  3. do drani

items.text: I claim that this is true.
Bob asserts that he is right.
items.answer: `la .bob. cu xusra lo du'u ri drani`

items.text: I agree that this is good.

sections.content:
Conversation Challenge (1-2 min)

Say aloud:

  1. "I agree." → mi tugni
  2. "I deny that." → mi natfe ta
  3. "You are correct." → do drani

Summary

You learned four discussion words: xusra (assert), tugni (agree), natfe (deny), drani (correct).
